title: The Wilderness world of Sigurd F. Olson
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Wilderness areas - United States
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wilderness areas - United States
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental protection - Citizen participation
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wilderness areas - Canada
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Seasons - Canada
description: An exploration of the creative response to nature of America's foremost interpretive naturalist, Sigurd F. Olson. He talks about the challenges and joys of writing, and the wilderness areas of Canada and the northern United States, with film of the dramatic changing seasons of this area.
